meanings.definition: An area of firm ground for parking vehicles or storing materials.
meanings.sent1: The construction site had a spacious hardstanding for trucks to park on.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse had a large hardstanding for storing heavy equipment.
meanings.sent3: The hardstanding was so sturdy that even an elephant could park on it!
meanings.sent4: The hardstanding was like a reliable friend, always there to support the vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The hardstanding gleamed under the sun, inviting cars to rest upon its solid surface.

meanings.definition: The act of providing a hard surface for vehicles or materials to stand on.
meanings.sent1: The construction crew worked hard on the hardstanding for the new parking lot.
meanings.sent2: The company specialized in hardstanding services for industrial sites.
meanings.sent3: The hardstanding project turned into a competition of who could make it the shiniest!
meanings.sent4: The hardstanding was a shield against the soft ground, protecting the vehicles above.
meanings.sent5: The hardstanding stood strong, a testament to human ingenuity in creating stable surfaces.
